rows.label: bf05040100_0020
rows.name:
Hikari-sama?
What are you doing? At this hour?

rows.label: bf05040100_0030
rows.name:
This season, the nights on the Cloud Sea are cold.
You'll catch a cold, you know?

rows.label: bf05040100_0040
rows.name: I'm a Blade. I don't catch colds.

rows.label: bf05040100_0080
rows.name: I am Fan la Norne, Blade to His Holiness Marveni.

rows.label: bf05040100_0100
rows.name:
Sorry, my mistake. You just reminded
me of somebody I know.

rows.label: bf05040100_0110
rows.name:
It is indeed cold here. I'll follow 
your advice and return to my room.

rows.label: bf05040100_0140
rows.name:
(Hikari-chan, did you see her
Core Crystal's shape?)

rows.label: bf05040100_0150
rows.name:
(I know.
It's not just a normal resonance.)

rows.label: bf05040100_0160
rows.name: (It's different from us and Rex too.)

rows.label: bf05040100_0170
rows.name:
(Looks like the number of
questions for Marveni went up.)

rows.label: bf05040100_0180
rows.name:
(Sorry, I want to think about something, 
so can you switch places?)
